Reviews.Title: “Best Western Trafalgar Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Philip S
Reviews.Content: stayed night prior leaving airport morning booked single smoking contained expect 3 star hotel 7th floor advantage balcony views city bathroom clean equipt toiletries arrived sunday evening bar closed hey plenty nearby eat hotel time factors dining look pleasant satff friendly welcoming helpful

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, courteous service.”
Reviews.Author: jonnym127
Reviews.Content: clean kept hotel courteous staff stayed six nights hotel metro stations easy easily city madrid rate reasonable 86 euros night double bed quiet breakfast included worth paying 540 euros person quality breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JamesV92
Reviews.Content: value hotel neighborhood madrid stayed cost €60 affordable option watch real madrid bernabeu hotel centre city close metro stations offer quick links airport major attractions supermarket shops nearby reasonable choice restaurants stayed quality bed comfortable particularly impressed quality cleanliness bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Hotel en Chamberi”
Reviews.Author: supersabio
Reviews.Content: hotel situated 50 metres plaza de madrids hidden treasures surrounding streets delightful bars restaurantsthe hotel close metro stations hotel managed welcoming helpful reception equiped

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in Downtown”
Reviews.Author: EngineerCoventry
Reviews.Content: clean modern minutes walk metro stations english channel tv cnn staff friendly helpful noise adjacent disturb occasionally pay €1 time safe expensive service apart breakfast restaurant weekends plenty cafes nearby stay

Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel in Madrid downtown”
Reviews.Author: igorek
Reviews.Content: night stay sleep amazed expediacom special rate 57 including taxes breakfast clean simple decor nice friendly knowledgeable staff escorted shown arrival free wifi slow drawback paper thin walls earplugs neighborhood lot barsclubs etc couple minutes subway

Reviews.Title: “very modern and clean”
Reviews.Author: irisheyes67_11
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night hotel central location cleanmodern staff friendly fluent english downstairs hosts cafe basically continental style breakfast hard cooked cheese pastries toast coffee amazing time 2011 price 6 euro baths clean modern beds free wifi plus

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, good option in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: schaefer1010
Reviews.Content: trafalgar residential madrid close nice plaza metro stations walking distance lots restaurants bars arround basic clean efficiently equipped dont expect breakfast coffee terrible bars arround complained lift persons

Reviews.Title: “This hotel provided great value and excellent service.”
Reviews.Author: michaelpom
Reviews.Content: arrival diligent porter carried reception checkin bathroom clean appointed comfortable balcony looked onto relatively street day hot airconditioning effectively internet connection available reasonable cost breakfast included overall cost excellent value

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Trafalgar
HotelInfo.Address: Trafalgar 35, 28010 Madrid, Spain
